StyledChartPoint() class represents a point in the X,Y space with point specific style (line color, fill color, marker color and size).
StyledChartPoint() - 类 的构造器it.bradipao.lib.descharts.StyledChartPoint
Constructor, X and Y are zeroed.
StyledChartPoint(float, float) - 类 的构造器it.bradipao.lib.descharts.StyledChartPoint
Constructor, X and Y are assigned.
StyledChartPoint(float, float, int) - 类 的构造器it.bradipao.lib.descharts.StyledChartPoint
Constructor, line color, X and Y are assigned.
StyledChartPoint(float, float, int, int) - 类 的构造器it.bradipao.lib.descharts.StyledChartPoint
Constructor, line color, fill color, X and Y are assigned.
StyledChartPoint(float, float, int, int, int, float) - 类 的构造器it.bradipao.lib.descharts.StyledChartPoint
Constructor, line color, fill color, marker color, marker seize, X and Y are assigned.
StyledChartPointSerie - it.bradipao.lib.descharts中的类
StyledChartPointSerie() class represents a line graph to be plotted.
StyledChartPointSerie() - 类 的构造器it.bradipao.lib.descharts.StyledChartPointSerie
Constructor, properties are default.
StyledChartPointSerie(float) - 类 的构造器it.bradipao.lib.descharts.StyledChartPointSerie
Constructor, properties are default except width.
StyledChartPointSerie(float, boolean) - 类 的构造器it.bradipao.lib.descharts.StyledChartPointSerie
Constructor, width and usedip are provided.
StyledXyChartView - it.bradipao.lib.descharts中的类
